description: Gets the status, metrics, and errors (if there are any) that are associated with a job.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The current status of the job.

nested_items.name: startTime
nested_items.description: The time at which the job was started.

nested_items.name: endTime
nested_items.description: The time at which the job has finished.

nested_items.name: inputRecords
nested_items.description: The total number of input records.

nested_items.name: totalRecordsProcessed
nested_items.description: The total number of records processed.

nested_items.name: recordsNotProcessed
nested_items.description: The total number of records that did not get processed.

nested_items.name: errorDetails
nested_items.description: An object containing an error message, if there was an error.

nested_items.name: errorMessage
nested_items.description: The error message from the job, if there is one.

nested_items.name: roleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role. Entity Resolution assumes this role to access Amazon Web Services resources on your behalf as part of workflow execution.

nested_items.name: outputS3Path
nested_items.description: The S3 path to which Entity Resolution will write the output table.

nested_items.name: KMSArn
nested_items.description: Customer KMS ARN for encryption at rest. If not provided, system will use an Entity Resolution managed KMS key.
